title: Add Internet Identity authentication system

requirements.text: Integrate Internet Identity login button on the landing page header, replacing or supplementing the existing navigation with a 'Login' button that triggers the Internet Identity authentication flow
acceptanceCriteria: Login button is visible in the landing page header
Clicking the login button initiates Internet Identity authentication
Successful login redirects users to their appropriate dashboard based on role

requirements.text: Create a user registration flow that allows new users to select their role (Student, Industry Partner, Admin) after completing Internet Identity authentication for the first time
acceptanceCriteria: First-time users see a role selection interface after authentication
Role selection includes Student, Industry Partner, and Admin options
Selected role is stored and persists across sessions
Users are redirected to their role-specific dashboard after selection

requirements.text: Implement backend user profile storage in Motoko to persist user data including principal ID, selected role, registration timestamp, and basic profile information
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores user profiles with principal ID as the key
User role (Student/Industry/Admin) is persisted
Registration timestamp is recorded
Profile data survives canister upgrades

requirements.text: Add authentication guards to all dashboard routes (Student, Industry, Admin) that redirect unauthenticated users to the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Unauthenticated users cannot access dashboard pages
Attempting to access protected routes redirects to landing page
Authenticated users can access their role-specific dashboard
Authentication state is checked on route navigation

requirements.text: Add a logout button to all dashboard sidebars that clears the Internet Identity session and redirects to the landing page
acceptanceCriteria: Logout button appears in the sidebar navigation of all dashboards
Clicking logout clears the authentication session
User is redirected to the landing page after logout
Session data is properly cleaned up

requirements.text: Implement role-based routing that automatically directs authenticated users to their correct dashboard (Student, Industry, or Admin) based on their stored role
acceptanceCriteria: Students are directed to /student-dashboard after login
Industry partners are directed to /industry-dashboard after login
Admins are directed to /admin-dashboard after login
Users attempting to access dashboards for other roles are redirected to their own dashboard

requirements.text: Create backend methods to store and retrieve user-specific data for students including saved projects, skill profile data, and mentorship messages so data persists across sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores student profile completion percentage
Student skill tags are persisted
Applied projects list is stored per user
Mentor messages are saved and retrievable
Data is associated with the user's principal ID

requirements.text: Create backend methods to store and retrieve industry partner data including posted projects, applicant lists, and analytics so data persists across sessions
acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores projects posted by industry partners
Project applicants are associated with each project
Analytics data (total applicants, engagement rate) is persisted
Data is scoped to the authenticated industry partner's principal ID

requirements.text: Update all dashboard pages to fetch and display real user data from the backend instead of using hardcoded dummy data
acceptanceCriteria: Student dashboard loads actual user profile and project data
Industry dashboard shows real posted projects and applicants
Admin dashboard displays actual platform metrics
Loading states are shown while fetching data
Empty states are shown when no data exists

constraints: Use the existing useInternetIdentity hook and useActor hook without modification
Maintain the current single-actor backend architecture
Preserve all existing dashboard UI layouts and styling
Keep the dark blue professional theme consistent across all pages
